cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 11, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7514, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 64 (Thursday, April 14, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KELLY of Pennsylvania:
H.R. 7514.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 7. To establish Post Offices
and post Roads.
[Page H4444]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 345 South Main Street in Butler, Pennsylvania, as the "Andrew Gomer Williams Post Office Building".
